name: Renaissance Boulder Flatiron Hotel

reviews.title: Excellent Hotel, Great Service
reviews.text: I stayed here on business. It was a beautiful hotel in a very convenient area. It was located next to a shopping mall that you can walk to. The room was very spacious and had a separate living room and bedroom areas. The decor of the hotel was also beautiful and the room was spotless. The room service was excellent and they catered to every need that you had. I would highly recommend this hotel to any traveler to Boulder.

reviews.title: Great hotel but where were the suites???
reviews.text: Great hotel but felt a little misled by the "Suites" part of the name. We have a 2-year-old and specifically stayed there so junior could take a nap in the bedroom and mommy and daddy would be able to watch TV or come and go as we please. Unlike a Crowne Plaza, Embassy Suites or even a suite at a Holiday Inn Express these Renaissance "suites" didn't come with a separate room! Basically it was one very nice, big, beautifully decorated room but no "suite." "Suite" to me means a separate bedroom; this room was basically a "studio!"

description: Experience the uniquely designed and artfully executed luxury of the Renaissance Boulder Suites hotel in Broomfield, CO, located along the US-36 Denver-to-Boulder corridor in the Interlocken Business Park and across the street from shopping at the Flatiron Crossing Mall. A leader in service amongst Boulder and Broomfield hotels, receiving Marriott's "Hotel of the Year" award and AAA's Four-Diamond rating. Our Broomfield hotel is connected to DIA Airport via the NW Parkway, offering convenient access to the University of Colorado and Boulder businesses. Nearby companies include Oracle, Ball, Staples, Level 3, McKesson, Covidien and Key Financial. Each of our 232 suites offer extraordinary touches that you would only expect to find in a truly luxury hotel. The award-winning Flatz Restaurant is an upscale restaurant featuring a fresh menu.
